headers.access-control-expose-headers: ETag, Link, Location, Retry-After, X-GitHub-OTP, X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Used, X-RateLimit-Resource, X-RateLimit-Reset, X-OAuth-Scopes, X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes, X-Poll-Interval, X-GitHub-Media-Type, X-GitHub-SSO, X-GitHub-Request-Id, Deprecation, Sunset

issueOrPullRequest.body:
This pull request adds an examples auto-run skill and refreshes example scripts for automated execution. It introduces the documented .codex/skills/examples-auto-run skill with a companion scripts/run.sh runner, updates examples/run_examples.py and examples/auto_mode.py to orchestrate auto mode execution, and touches the agent pattern, basic, customer_service, mcp, and tools examples to align with the new flow. It also adjusts .gitignore to support the workflow. No library code under src/agents was changed, so impact is limited to tooling and examples.

see also: https://github.com/openai/openai-agents-js/pull/848
issueOrPullRequest.title: feat: add examples auto-run skill and refresh example scripts
